document_data.name: Grimmantle
document_data.mainbody: '''Grimmantle''' was a kingdom in the eastern [[Crags]] in [[northwest Faerûn]].
document_data.History: The northern kingdom was founded by [[human]]s in [[272 DR]] to guard against [[orc]] attacks.
